column1: #Text=So Harper hid this knowledge for more than a year, Mr Secret strikes again.
#Text=If revenue increased so much more than expenses, why wasn't the surplus much bigger?'
#Text=Both men and women are living longer, yet the opposition parties want to roll back a legislated change to the age for receiving Old Age Security benefits, to 65 from 67.'
#Text=Even more reason why seniors still need that extra funding from age 65.
